Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to publishing records of public interest by agencies and the legislature
Summary: Relates to publishing records of public interest by agencies and the legislature on their websites.
LawCode: Amd §84, ren §90 to be §90-a, add §90, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to publishing records of public interest by agencies and the state legislature
